  physical_appearance: \The image shows three newspaper clippings that are pasted onto a light purple paper. There are several punched holes at its left side. \\The Great Soprano sat up and listened\\

  subject_terms_1: \\Praise from Miss Hammond\\ conductors celebrities concerts opera singers

  subject_terms_2: Celebrities Concerts Hammond
 Joan
 1912 - 1996 and \\Joan Hammond sings to packed audience\\ are the respective headlines of the three  newspaper clippings. The clipping on the left hand side contians a picture depicting a man playing a piano while a young lady stands and sings close by. The clipping on the upper right side features two ladies and a male sitting by a piano.\ Susskind
 Walter
 1913-1980
